original:
Like I care!

As if I care that you defeated the
Selectors all by your...
...Wait, what?!

You...
That's incredible...
translation:
Like I care!

As if I care that you defeated the
Selectors all by your...
...Wait, what?!

You...
That's incredible...

original:
While I'd love to be happy about
you defeating the Selectors...
It leaves us pondering what we
should be doing, now...
translation:
While I'd love to be happy about
you defeating the Selectors...
It leaves us pondering what we
should be doing, now...

original:
Like I care!

As if I care who you defeat or
what rank you are!
I don't care in the least!

But I will admit... reaching Legend
rank is pretty incredible...
translation:
Like I care!

As if I care who you defeat or
what rank you are!
I don't care in the least!

But I will admit... reaching Legend
rank is pretty incredible...

original:
You defeated the Selectors?!
I see... you did it...
You actually won...

Should I sing your praises or make 
a snide remark?
Even I don't know what to say.
translation:
You defeated the Selectors?!
I see... you did it...
You actually won...

Should I sing your praises or make 
a snide remark?
Even I don't know what to say.

original:
I'm only gonna say this once so
listen up...
Thank you, ^P...
For saving the world...
Due to that, it feels like my heart's
gonna shatter...
translation:
I'm only gonna say this once so
listen up...
Thank you, ^P...
For saving the world...
Due to that, it feels like my heart's
gonna shatter...

original:
Leg...end?
Sorry, I don't understand.
..........
It's not like I want to understand!
Seeing you, who's always a step
ahead...
It just makes me want to cry...
translation:
Leg...end?
Sorry, I don't understand.
..........
It's not like I want to understand!
Seeing you, who's always a step
ahead...
It just makes me want to cry...

original:
You defeated the Selectors?!
That's great news!
But of course I knew all along you'd
be able to do it!
translation:
You defeated the Selectors?!
That's great news!
But of course I knew all along you'd
be able to do it!

original:
While I had no doubt you'd be able
to defeat the Selectors...
I didn't expect you'd be able to do
it so easily...
You really are a Tamer beyond
comparison.
translation:
While I had no doubt you'd be able
to defeat the Selectors...
I didn't expect you'd be able to do
it so easily...
You really are a Tamer beyond
comparison.

original:
Legend Tamer, huh...?

There's no longer anyone who can
stand against you...
It was my dream to become
number one at the Colosseum...
But it looks like you're the one
who fufilled that dream...
translation:
Legend Tamer, huh...?

There's no longer anyone who can
stand against you...
It was my dream to become
number one at the Colosseum...
But it looks like you're the one
who fufilled that dream...

original:
I heard the rumors, you defeated
the Selectors, right?
Plus by the sounds of it, you saved
all those who'd been kidnapped too.
You truly are a real-deal savior.

You're so cool, its depressing for
losers like us...
translation:
I heard the rumors, you defeated
the Selectors, right?
Plus by the sounds of it, you saved
all those who'd been kidnapped too.
You truly are a real-deal savior.

You're so cool, its depressing for
losers like us...

original:
Oh yeah, I forgot to say...

Thank you for saving the Digital
World.
Please ignore my monotone voice.
translation:
Oh yeah, I forgot to say...

Thank you for saving the Digital
World.
Please ignore my monotone voice.

original:
I heard you'd become a Legend
Tamer.
Not that I had intended on making
a comment or anything...
.........
.........
Must be nice...
translation:
I heard you'd become a Legend
Tamer.
Not that I had intended on making
a comment or anything...
.........
.........
Must be nice...

original:
So you actually defeated the 
Selectors.
I'd heard the rumors but didn't
fully believe them until now.
But isn't it a little odd you 
somehow defeated them alone?
...It isn't that weird?
I guess if you say so...
After all, you are the best Tamer
in the Digital World.
translation:
So you actually defeated the 
Selectors.
I'd heard the rumors but didn't
fully believe them until now.
But isn't it a little odd you 
somehow defeated them alone?
...It isn't that weird?
I guess if you say so...
After all, you are the best Tamer
in the Digital World.

original:
Well, that's good. Really great.
Wonderful.
Everyone returned safe and sound,
the bad guys have been defeated.
...And yet, why do I feel so 
uneasy...?
translation:
Well, that's good. Really great.
Wonderful.
Everyone returned safe and sound,
the bad guys have been defeated.
...And yet, why do I feel so 
uneasy...?

original:
You're a Legend Tamer?
That's incredible, but...
Aren't you a little young to 
become a legend...?
translation:
You're a Legend Tamer?
That's incredible, but...
Aren't you a little young to 
become a legend...?

original:
...You defeated the Selectors?
You actually did it?!
I love hearing stories about others 
getting beat up!
Even better when the bad guy is
really annoying!
translation:
...You defeated the Selectors?
You actually did it?!
I love hearing stories about others 
getting beat up!
Even better when the bad guy is
really annoying!

original:
Alright, I'll praise you from the 
bottom of my heart.
Thank you, ^P.
translation:
Alright, I'll praise you from the 
bottom of my heart.
Thank you, ^P.

original:
You ranked up?!
To Legend Tamer?!
I don't really like hearing others'
success stories, but...
I'll make an exception for you!
Even though its a little annoying...
Well, whatever.
You did great out there!
translation:
You ranked up?!
To Legend Tamer?!
I don't really like hearing others'
success stories, but...
I'll make an exception for you!
Even though its a little annoying...
Well, whatever.
You did great out there!

original:
Oh, if it isn't our savior.
They say you saved the world?
That you infiltrated the Selectors
base all on your own,
Destroyed the Erasers, and took
out the Selectors with ease.
Not to mention you took back
all the kidnapped Tamers,
And repaired the Digital World
with ease...
The more I hear it, the more it
sounds like some ridiculous joke.
...Hm? Half are just rumors?
Then that means...
Half of that is actually true...?
translation:
Oh, if it isn't our savior.
They say you saved the world?
That you infiltrated the Selectors
base all on your own,
Destroyed the Erasers, and took
out the Selectors with ease.
Not to mention you took back
all the kidnapped Tamers,
And repaired the Digital World
with ease...
The more I hear it, the more it
sounds like some ridiculous joke.
...Hm? Half are just rumors?
Then that means...
Half of that is actually true...?

original:
At any rate, I must thank you.

For everything you've done, from
the bottom of my heart, thank you.
That's if... I still have a heart 
somewhere inside me... eh?
translation:
At any rate, I must thank you.

For everything you've done, from
the bottom of my heart, thank you.
That's if... I still have a heart 
somewhere inside me... eh?

original:
Finally... that is to say,
At last... that is to say,
After all... that is to say,
Right now... that is to say,
You've become a Legend Tamer.
Congratulations, ^P.
There's no doubt about it,
you're the best Tamer out there.
translation:
Finally... that is to say,
At last... that is to say,
After all... that is to say,
Right now... that is to say,
You've become a Legend Tamer.
Congratulations, ^P.
There's no doubt about it,
you're the best Tamer out there.

original:
You did it, [Player Name}!
I knew you could!
The rumor mentioned you not only
defeated the Selectors,
But you also eliminated the
Bandits as well.
...Huh? Is that not right?
translation:
You did it, [Player Name}!
I knew you could!
The rumor mentioned you not only
defeated the Selectors,
But you also eliminated the
Bandits as well.
...Huh? Is that not right?

original:
Sounds like the Bandits tried to 
defeat the Selectors as well...
...I can't help but feel troubled
hearing something like that...
Does that mean those guys 
weren't bad all along...?
translation:
Sounds like the Bandits tried to 
defeat the Selectors as well...
...I can't help but feel troubled
hearing something like that...
Does that mean those guys 
weren't bad all along...?

original:
Whoa! Legend Tamer!
Now you've gone and done it!
I knew all along you were one
incredible Tamer, damn it!
As expected of the Tamer I
found to have potential!
translation:
Whoa! Legend Tamer!
Now you've gone and done it!
I knew all along you were one
incredible Tamer, damn it!
As expected of the Tamer I
found to have potential!

original:
Oh my, if it isn't our savior!
Welcome! Come in!♪
What's up with that amused
face...?
Isn't that what everyone in the 
area's calling you?
Then it must be true, huh?
Right, savior?♪
translation:
Oh my, if it isn't our savior!
Welcome! Come in!♪
What's up with that amused
face...?
Isn't that what everyone in the 
area's calling you?
Then it must be true, huh?
Right, savior?♪

original:
But to think you handled it all on
your own...
What's that? You weren't all
alone...?
The Bandits helped you...?
You mean THOSE shady guys...?
Huh... I guess you shouldn't judge
people by their looks...
translation:
But to think you handled it all on
your own...
What's that? You weren't all
alone...?
The Bandits helped you...?
You mean THOSE shady guys...?
Huh... I guess you shouldn't judge
people by their looks...

original:
Oh my, this time you're going for
Legend Tamer?!
I had heard about Tamers
becoming legendary before, but...
I didn't realize it was an actual
Tamer Rank...
But well... It suits you well,
^P!
After all, you're already a 
legend♪
translation:
Oh my, this time you're going for
Legend Tamer?!
I had heard about Tamers
becoming legendary before, but...
I didn't realize it was an actual
Tamer Rank...
But well... It suits you well,
^P!
After all, you're already a 
legend♪

original:
...Oh, ^P?!

While those who were kidnapped
ended up returning...
It seems no one remembers what
even happened to them.
It seems they remember feeling
suffocated, but that's all...
It seems something erased their
memories before they returned.
What happened with the Selectors?
Did someone do something...?
translation:
...Oh, ^P?!

While those who were kidnapped
ended up returning...
It seems no one remembers what
even happened to them.
It seems they remember feeling
suffocated, but that's all...
It seems something erased their
memories before they returned.
What happened with the Selectors?
Did someone do something...?

original:
...You and the Bandits defeated
the Selectors together...?
As for you, I'd expect as such, but
the Bandits...?
Somehow... I really can't accept
such a thing as the truth...
translation:
...You and the Bandits defeated
the Selectors together...?
As for you, I'd expect as such, but
the Bandits...?
Somehow... I really can't accept
such a thing as the truth...

original:
So you've finally become a
Legend Tamer...
Sorry, it's difficult for me to give
a proper reaction.
I don't really understand the 
difference with Gold Rank...
So I can't really make a proper
comment...
...But I guess I can at least
congratulate you...
translation:
So you've finally become a
Legend Tamer...
Sorry, it's difficult for me to give
a proper reaction.
I don't really understand the 
difference with Gold Rank...
So I can't really make a proper
comment...
...But I guess I can at least
congratulate you...

original:
You beat the Selectors?
Congratulations, ^P!
Great job out there. Sorry 
I couldn't be of any help.
That Lumore kid begged me not
to leave him.
I just couldn't get away from
him.
Seems he's pretty embarassed
now that everyone's back.
So he's doing his best to help
everyone out now.
translation:
You beat the Selectors?
Congratulations, ^P!
Great job out there. Sorry 
I couldn't be of any help.
That Lumore kid begged me not
to leave him.
I just couldn't get away from
him.
Seems he's pretty embarassed
now that everyone's back.
So he's doing his best to help
everyone out now.

original:
Right now, the crowd's going wild
out there!
Holding a rank up battle for
Legend Tamer rank...
Hey, it's you who's participating
in this match, isn't it?
It was obivous, there's no other
Tamer on such a level.
^P, you're the only
one who can become a legend!
translation:
Right now, the crowd's going wild
out there!
Holding a rank up battle for
Legend Tamer rank...
Hey, it's you who's participating
in this match, isn't it?
It was obivous, there's no other
Tamer on such a level.
^P, you're the only
one who can become a legend!

original:
Congratulations, ^P.

You're the greatest Tamer in the
Digital World.
To me, you're the greatest Tamer
in the entire world♪
translation:
Congratulations, ^P.

You're the greatest Tamer in the
Digital World.
To me, you're the greatest Tamer
in the entire world♪

original:
You beat the Selectors?
Great job, ^P!
You did well out there. Sorry 
I couldn't be of any help...
That Lumore pleaded with me not
to leave him.
I just couldn't get away...

Seems he's pretty embarassed
now that everyone's back.
So he's doing his best to help
everyone out now.
translation:
You beat the Selectors?
Great job, ^P!
You did well out there. Sorry 
I couldn't be of any help...
That Lumore pleaded with me not
to leave him.
I just couldn't get away...

Seems he's pretty embarassed
now that everyone's back.
So he's doing his best to help
everyone out now.

original:
Right now, the crowd is roaring
with excitement!
They're holding a rank up battle for
Legend Tamer rank...
It's you who's participating
in this match, isn't it?
Of course it is, there's no other
Tamer on such a level.
^P, you're the only
one who can become a legend!
translation:
Right now, the crowd is roaring
with excitement!
They're holding a rank up battle for
Legend Tamer rank...
It's you who's participating
in this match, isn't it?
Of course it is, there's no other
Tamer on such a level.
^P, you're the only
one who can become a legend!

original:
Congratulations, ^P.

You're the greatest Tamer in the
Digital World.
But to me, you're the greatest 
Tamer in the entire world♪
translation:
Congratulations, ^P.

You're the greatest Tamer in the
Digital World.
But to me, you're the greatest 
Tamer in the entire world♪

original:
I've just been meandering about
not knowing what's going on.
My head's pounding,
my memories are gone...
All I know is that you saved us.
translation:
I've just been meandering about
not knowing what's going on.
My head's pounding,
my memories are gone...
All I know is that you saved us.

original:
Saying this as a rookie Tamer to a
veteran Tamer,
I must thank you for saving us,
^P.
...What's with that spaced out
look?
You may be a veteran, but you've
still got further you can go!
You can aim to become a Legend
Tamer now!
I'm looking forward to it♪
translation:
Saying this as a rookie Tamer to a
veteran Tamer,
I must thank you for saving us,
^P.
...What's with that spaced out
look?
You may be a veteran, but you've
still got further you can go!
You can aim to become a Legend
Tamer now!
I'm looking forward to it♪

original:
You did it, ^P,
You're finally a Legend Tamer.
With that, you've now become
a goal for everyone else.
Be a good Tamer, just like me.
translation:
You did it, ^P,
You're finally a Legend Tamer.
With that, you've now become
a goal for everyone else.
Be a good Tamer, just like me.

original:
Oh, ^P...
Thank you for saving us.
But it seems I'm the only one who
remembers that...
After all, I was the last one that
was erased.
If you hadn't come to save us,
I'd be an Eraser right now...
It's all thanks to you that I'm
standing here right now.
To think I once considered you
a rival...
Seems I was too conceited.
translation:
Oh, ^P...
Thank you for saving us.
But it seems I'm the only one who
remembers that...
After all, I was the last one that
was erased.
If you hadn't come to save us,
I'd be an Eraser right now...
It's all thanks to you that I'm
standing here right now.
To think I once considered you
a rival...
Seems I was too conceited.

original:
It's a little strange, I still have
pieces of my memory...
The time when I was being 
controlled by the Selectors,
When I was swallowed up by
some sort of machine...
...I suddenly felt overwhelmingly
at peace...
The fact I still remember that...
It's really scary...
translation:
It's a little strange, I still have
pieces of my memory...
The time when I was being 
controlled by the Selectors,
When I was swallowed up by
some sort of machine...
...I suddenly felt overwhelmingly
at peace...
The fact I still remember that...
It's really scary...

original:
Congratulations on ranking up to
Legend Tamer Rank♪
It was a natural progression for 
someone like you.
Everyone here knew you could
do it!
translation:
Congratulations on ranking up to
Legend Tamer Rank♪
It was a natural progression for 
someone like you.
Everyone here knew you could
do it!

original:
I made a light-hearted 
comment about how 
When the Championships were 
over, I was considering 
Getting married and taking 
over the DigiFarm...
...I almost became a real deal
dead fragment!
That was a close one!
translation:
I made a light-hearted 
comment about how 
When the Championships were 
over, I was considering 
Getting married and taking 
over the DigiFarm...
...I almost became a real deal
dead fragment!
That was a close one!

original:
When I was kidnapped by the
Selectors, I had a weird dream...
I suddenly grew a bunch of legs,
and my tongue shot way out!
It was pretty gross. It really 
freaked me out.
...It sure was a weird dream, huh?
translation:
When I was kidnapped by the
Selectors, I had a weird dream...
I suddenly grew a bunch of legs,
and my tongue shot way out!
It was pretty gross. It really 
freaked me out.
...It sure was a weird dream, huh?

original:
You became a Legend Tamer...?
Unbelieveable...
...But I guess not really.
It is YOU after all, ^P.
.........
.........
I'm at a bit of a loss for words
right now.
translation:
You became a Legend Tamer...?
Unbelieveable...
...But I guess not really.
It is YOU after all, ^P.
.........
.........
I'm at a bit of a loss for words
right now.

original:
I don't think I trained hard enough.

No matter how much I cry about it,
nothing will change.
So I need to get over it.

No matter how many times it 
takes, I'll keep getting back up...
Until the day I can finally be
your equal in battle.
translation:
I don't think I trained hard enough.

No matter how much I cry about it,
nothing will change.
So I need to get over it.

No matter how many times it 
takes, I'll keep getting back up...
Until the day I can finally be
your equal in battle.

original:
Oh, I forgot to say this before...
Thank you, ^P.
If you weren't here...

Those at the Colosseum would 
have never been rescued...
.........
You really are a great Tamer.
You're aiming for Legend rank,
right? 
Good luck, World Champ!
translation:
Oh, I forgot to say this before...
Thank you, ^P.
If you weren't here...

Those at the Colosseum would 
have never been rescued...
.........
You really are a great Tamer.
You're aiming for Legend rank,
right? 
Good luck, World Champ!

original:
Congratulations, ^P.

There isn't a Tamer in the world
who can stand against you now.
Which also means if we keep
chasing your shadow,
We'll reach the top someday, too!

It's always motivating to have
a goal♪
So please battle with us again
when you have the time!
translation:
Congratulations, ^P.

There isn't a Tamer in the world
who can stand against you now.
Which also means if we keep
chasing your shadow,
We'll reach the top someday, too!

It's always motivating to have
a goal♪
So please battle with us again
when you have the time!

original:
Great job out there, ^P.

I thought it was all over when I
got kidnapped by the Selectors...
I was just a pathetic, useless 
Tamer who lost their memory...
Once we regained conciousness,
we all returned here...
And heard about what happened 
from the Colosseum staff.
That you had defeated the
Selectors, ^P.
...Thank you, ^P.
From the bottom of my heart.
translation:
Great job out there, ^P.

I thought it was all over when I
got kidnapped by the Selectors...
I was just a pathetic, useless 
Tamer who lost their memory...
Once we regained conciousness,
we all returned here...
And heard about what happened 
from the Colosseum staff.
That you had defeated the
Selectors, ^P.
...Thank you, ^P.
From the bottom of my heart.

original:
........
By the way, ^P,
It seems the odds of winning right
now are 2 to 1...
...Hm?
What am I talking about...?
I'm talking about your odds of
ranking up to Legend Rank.
...What? You haven't even
registered yet??
Everyone's betting on you, so
do your best out there♪
translation:
........
By the way, ^P,
It seems the odds of winning right
now are 2 to 1...
...Hm?
What am I talking about...?
I'm talking about your odds of
ranking up to Legend Rank.
...What? You haven't even
registered yet??
Everyone's betting on you, so
do your best out there♪

original:
Oh, you did it, ^P!
Legend Tamer rank!
Now there's no doubt you're the
greatest Tamer in the world.
.........
.........
...Oh, no it's nothing...
Don't worry about it.
I just felt a little discouraged,
looking at myself in comparison...
translation:
Oh, you did it, ^P!
Legend Tamer rank!
Now there's no doubt you're the
greatest Tamer in the world.
.........
.........
...Oh, no it's nothing...
Don't worry about it.
I just felt a little discouraged,
looking at myself in comparison...

original:
Oh, it's the savior of the Digital
World...
You defeated the Selectors all by
yourself, and saved everyone, huh?
...Meanwhile, what am I doing?

I can't do a single thing.
I just got kidnapped and rescued.
And to top things off, I lost
the battle...
"You fought well" ...?
What? Is that a message?
From who?? 
"Who knows"...
Jeez...
translation:
Oh, it's the savior of the Digital
World...
You defeated the Selectors all by
yourself, and saved everyone, huh?
...Meanwhile, what am I doing?

I can't do a single thing.
I just got kidnapped and rescued.
And to top things off, I lost
the battle...
"You fought well" ...?
What? Is that a message?
From who?? 
"Who knows"...
Jeez...

original:
...Sniff... sniff...
I-I'm not crying, okay?
O-of course I'm not crying!
...Sniff...
It's been so long since someone
acknowledged me...
My nose is just hurting a little, 
okay?
translation:
...Sniff... sniff...
I-I'm not crying, okay?
O-of course I'm not crying!
...Sniff...
It's been so long since someone
acknowledged me...
My nose is just hurting a little, 
okay?

original:
.........
Ah, sorry, I zoned out there.
Though it's pretty obvious to see
I was in thought, if you looked.
The battle to become a Legend
Tamer is incredibly tough,
How did you manage to rank up
so easily...?
Hmph... How boring...
But whatever... Congrats.
It pains me to say this, but you
really are the best Tamer♪
translation:
.........
Ah, sorry, I zoned out there.
Though it's pretty obvious to see
I was in thought, if you looked.
The battle to become a Legend
Tamer is incredibly tough,
How did you manage to rank up
so easily...?
Hmph... How boring...
But whatever... Congrats.
It pains me to say this, but you
really are the best Tamer♪

original: Remove the Crystal Bugs, okay?
translation: Remove the Crystal Bugs, okay?

original: Good Luck!♪
translation: Good Luck!♪

original: Oh no, you damaged the DigiPlate?!
translation: Oh no, you damaged the DigiPlate?!

original: You can't cut there...
translation: You can't cut there...

original:
You did it! The Crystal Bugs are
all gone!
translation:
You did it! The Crystal Bugs are
all gone!

original:
Oh no...
You ran out of time...
translation:
Oh no...
You ran out of time...

original:
AHHHHH!
THE DIGIPLATE'S GONNA BREAK!
translation:
AHHHHH!
THE DIGIPLATE'S GONNA BREAK!

original:
You can't apply Putty there, 
you know?
translation:
You can't apply Putty there, 
you know?

original: You can't File that spot, okay?
translation: You can't File that spot, okay?

original:
You gotta scrub the DigiPlate,
got it?
translation:
You gotta scrub the DigiPlate,
got it?

original:
You did it!
You repaired the DigiPlate!♪
translation:
You did it!
You repaired the DigiPlate!♪

original: Oh no! Not good!
translation: Oh no! Not good!

original:
Too bad...
Let's try harder next time, okay?
translation:
Too bad...
Let's try harder next time, okay?

original: Time's up, okay?
translation: Time's up, okay?

original: Make that DigiPlate shine, got it?♪
translation: Make that DigiPlate shine, got it?♪

original:
You can't use the Mega Laser 
there, you know?
translation:
You can't use the Mega Laser 
there, you know?

original:
Ahhh! Please be a little more
careful, okay?
translation:
Ahhh! Please be a little more
careful, okay?

original: AAAHHHHH!!!
translation: AAAHHHHH!!!

original:
Oh no, there's a crack in the
DigiPlate...
translation:
Oh no, there's a crack in the
DigiPlate...

original:
80 seconds left! 
That should be plenty of time!
translation:
80 seconds left! 
That should be plenty of time!

original:
60 seconds left!
Don't let your guard down!
translation:
60 seconds left!
Don't let your guard down!

original:
40 seconds left!
Keep going, don't panic!
translation:
40 seconds left!
Keep going, don't panic!

original:
30 seconds left!
You gotta pick up the pace!
translation:
30 seconds left!
You gotta pick up the pace!

original:
Only a few seconds left!
Hurry! There's no time!
translation:
Only a few seconds left!
Hurry! There's no time!

original:
AHH! It's almost time!
Hurry! HURRY!
translation:
AHH! It's almost time!
Hurry! HURRY!

original: Time for the results!
translation: Time for the results!

original: Let's see...
translation: Let's see...

original: The score for this DigiPlate is...
translation: The score for this DigiPlate is...

original:
A perfect score!
You did an amazing job!♪
translation:
A perfect score!
You did an amazing job!♪

original:
Almost full marks!
You're really good at this!♪
translation:
Almost full marks!
You're really good at this!♪

original:
Not bad at all!
Momentai!
translation:
Not bad at all!
Momentai!

original:
Momentai...
I guess...??
translation:
Momentai...
I guess...??

original:
That's too bad... 
It didn't turn out very good...
translation:
That's too bad... 
It didn't turn out very good...

original:
Hmm, this is...
Pretty bad...
translation:
Hmm, this is...
Pretty bad...

original:
I see, this is a DigiPlate of 
^0, huh?
translation:
I see, this is a DigiPlate of 
^0, huh?

original:
Looks like you've gotten a better
score on a previous DigiPlate.
translation:
Looks like you've gotten a better
score on a previous DigiPlate.

original:
I'll just leave this Plate in your
Digivice, then!
translation:
I'll just leave this Plate in your
Digivice, then!

original:
Amazing! This is your best 
DigiPlate score so far!♪
translation:
Amazing! This is your best 
DigiPlate score so far!♪

original:
Then I'll overwrite the current
Plate in your Digivice with this one!
translation:
Then I'll overwrite the current
Plate in your Digivice with this one!

original:
Amazing! This is the first of
this DigiPlate you've repaired!♪
translation:
Amazing! This is the first of
this DigiPlate you've repaired!♪

original: I'll put this in your Digivice!
translation: I'll put this in your Digivice!

original:
Hmmm... It looks like you scored
better on the Plate in the Tree.
translation:
Hmmm... It looks like you scored
better on the Plate in the Tree.

original:
Looks like you scored better than
the Plate in the Evolution Tree!♪
translation:
Looks like you scored better than
the Plate in the Evolution Tree!♪

original:
I'll overwrite the Plate in the
Evolution Tree with this one!
translation:
I'll overwrite the Plate in the
Evolution Tree with this one!

original:
That's it for repairs!
See you again sometime!♪
translation:
That's it for repairs!
See you again sometime!♪

original:
The remaining Crystal Bugs
are gonna explode, you know?!
translation:
The remaining Crystal Bugs
are gonna explode, you know?!

original:
But it looks like the DigiPlate is
safe. Then all is good!
translation:
But it looks like the DigiPlate is
safe. Then all is good!

original:
It's kind of like getting back a
new technique!
translation:
It's kind of like getting back a
new technique!

original:
Look at that! The DigiPlate is 
looking a lot better now♪
translation:
Look at that! The DigiPlate is 
looking a lot better now♪

original: Leave the Repairing to me♪
translation: Leave the Repairing to me♪

original:
First, we have to destroy all 
these Crystal Bugs.
translation:
First, we have to destroy all 
these Crystal Bugs.

original:
You need skills to make sure 
you don't crack the DigiPlate.
translation:
You need skills to make sure 
you don't crack the DigiPlate.

original:
Apply some Putty to the cracks♪
File off the Putty with the File♪
translation:
Apply some Putty to the cracks♪
File off the Putty with the File♪

original:
Clean it up with the Cleaner 
and the Plate is restored!
translation:
Clean it up with the Cleaner 
and the Plate is restored!

original: That's it! We're done!
translation: That's it! We're done!

original:
I'll leave the rest to Terriermon!
See you next time!♪
translation:
I'll leave the rest to Terriermon!
See you next time!♪

original:
It's no use until this DigiPlate is
fully restored...
translation:
It's no use until this DigiPlate is
fully restored...
